title: Reefer Madness 2.0, New Trump Book Is Messy AF 1.4.18
itunes:title: Reefer Madness 2.0, New Trump Book Is Messy AF 1.4.18
description:
In episode 57, Jack & Miles are joined by comedian Kaseem Bentley to discuss the raw water, plus they call Ben Reccius, a lawyer specializing in cannabis business law to talk Jeff Sessions plans to end legalized weed, the Trump tell-all book & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
